item.title: CVE-2024-29762|2024-03-27T13:13:01.996Z -- Jory Hogeveen -- Off-Canvas Sidebars & Menus (Slidebars)
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jory Hogeveen Off-Canvas Sidebars & Menus (Slidebars) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Off-Canvas Sidebars & Menus (Slidebars): from n/a through 0.5.8.1.
